entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
